nodes.text: The Kaleesh were a sentient species from the Wild Space world of Kalee. The most notorious member of the species, General Grievous, fought as the Supreme Martial Commander of the Separatist Droid Armies during the Clone Wars.

A species of red-skinned humanoid reptilians from the planet Kalee in Wild Space, the Kaleesh had two yellow eyes with slit pupils. Although all of their facial features were reminiscent of bats, such as their elongated ears and flat noses, the Kaleesh usually wore masks. They were digitigrades, walking on their toes rather than their entire feet, and they possessed a brain, a heart, and lungs. Their internal organs were extremely flammable.
The Kaleesh were known for their lack of mercy.
At one point before the Clone Wars, the Kaleesh fought a war against the insectoid Yam'rii from the planet Huk.

One of the species' most well-known members was General Grievous, who was also regarded as its most infamous. His mostly cybernetic body eliminated almost any resemblance to other Kaleesh. As the Supreme Commander of the Separatist Droid Army, he fought in the Clone Wars until he was killed by Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi during the Battle of Utapau. The Delphidian pirate Sidon Ithano wore a Kaleesh mask.
